alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, eastern Pasco, southeastern Hernando, northwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dade City to 6 miles west of Plant City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Brandon, Hillsborough River State Park, Combee Settlement, Zephyrhills South, Zephyrhills West, Zephyrhills North, Fussels Corner, Ridge Manor, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Richland, Plant City Airport, Winston, Kathleen, Rockridge, Withla and Dover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
